original_text: ‘Wake up the people in all the countries! Bring them into the Valley of Jehoshaphat. I will sit there to judge the people from every place. ‘Wake up the people in all the countries!
korean_text: 민족들은 일어나서 여호사밧 골짜기로 올라올지어다 내가 거기에 앉아서 사면의 민족들을 다 심판하리로다

sentences.original_text: Wake up the people in all the countries!
Bring them into the Valley of Jehoshaphat.
I will sit there to judge the people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그곳에 앉아 백성들을 심판할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Wake up the people in all the countries!
